definitions.definition: A layer of short hairs underneath the longer ones of an animal's fur
A coat of paint or other material applied onto a surface before that of a topcoat ; a coloured primer .
A coat for wearing indoors, under an overcoat .

main_definition: A layer of short hairs underneath the longer ones of an animal's fur
secondary_definitions: A coat of paint or other material applied onto a surface before that of a topcoat ; a coloured primer .
( obsolete ) A coat for wearing indoors, under an overcoat .
